name: Terraria
author: support@pyro.host
description: Terraria dedicated server with TShock mod support

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /mnt/server

echo "📥 Installing Terraria server..."

# Update packages
apt update
apt install -y curl unzip wget jq

# Download TShock (latest stable)
echo "📥 Downloading TShock for Terraria..."
TSHOCK_VERSION="5.2.0"
DOWNLOAD_URL="https://github.com/Pryaxis/TShock/releases/download/v${TSHOCK_VERSION}/TShock-${TSHOCK_VERSION}-linux-x64-Release.zip"

echo "🔗 Download URL: $DOWNLOAD_URL"
curl -L -o tshock.zip "$DOWNLOAD_URL"

if [ ! -f "tshock.zip" ]; then
    echo "❌ Failed to download TShock"
    exit 1
fi

echo "📦 Extracting TShock..."
unzip -o tshock.zip
rm tshock.zip

# Make executable
chmod +x TerrariaServer.bin.x86_64 || chmod +x TShock.Server

# Create default server config
echo "⚙️ Creating server configuration..."
cat > serverconfig.txt << EOF
world={{WORLD_PATH}}
port={{SERVER_PORT}}
maxplayers={{MAX_PLAYERS}}
password={{SERVER_PASSWORD}}
motd={{SERVER_MOTD}}
worldname={{WORLD_NAME}}
autocreate={{WORLD_SIZE}}
difficulty={{DIFFICULTY}}
seed={{WORLD_SEED}}
language={{LANGUAGE}}
secure=1
noupnp=1
EOF

# Create worlds directory
mkdir -p worlds

echo "✅ Terraria TShock server installation completed!"
echo "🌍 World will be created automatically on first start"
echo "🎮 Server ready to start!"
echo "📊 Server will run on port ${SERVER_PORT}"
echo "👥 Max players: ${MAX_PLAYERS}"
echo "🌍 World: ${WORLD_NAME}"

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: The port to bind the server to.

variables.name: Maximum Players
variables.description: The maximum number of players that can join the server.

variables.name: World Name
variables.description: The name of the world file and the world itself.

variables.name: World Path
variables.description: Path to the world file. Will be created automatically if it doesn't exist.

variables.name: World Size
variables.description: The size of the world. 1 = Small, 2 = Medium, 3 = Large

variables.name: World Difficulty
variables.description: The difficulty of the world. 0 = Classic, 1 = Expert, 2 = Master, 3 = Journey

variables.name: World Seed
variables.description: The seed for world generation. Leave empty for random.

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: The password required to join the server. Leave empty for no password.

variables.name: Server MOTD
variables.description: The message of the day that appears when players join.

variables.name: Language
variables.description: Server language. 1 = English, 2 = German, 3 = Italian, 4 = French, 5 = Spanish, 6 = Russian, 7 = Chinese, 8 = Portuguese, 9 = Polish
